summary: A small mod that causes Ordinator's iron fist perk to only require the right hand to be empty. Now you can hold a shield, a spell or whatever else in your left hand and still have the perk work.
descriptionHtml:
I was trying to find a way to have the ability to block without giving up the iron fist perk in Ordinator and this is what I came up with.

Simply put, the iron fist perk checks if the right and left hand are empty and doesn't apply unless both conditions are met. I changed the left hand condition so it is always true using TES5Edit and kept the right hand condition the same. This comes with a few quirks such as:
[list]
[*]Bashing with a shield and an empty hand is now a lot stronger
[*]Using a 1-hand weapon in your left hand and nothing else allows can allow you to keep the damage bonus
[/list]
[u]Requirements[/u]

[url=https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68425]Just Ordinator, but that should have been obvious.[/url]
Recommended

[url=https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27627]Gauntlet Armor - Unarmed Blocking[/url]
[url=https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/78257]Fortified blocking guantlets[/url]
[url=https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74327]Unarmed attack variation and blocking[/url] this mod provides a nicer way of dealing with unarmed blocking, but doesn't allow anything in the left hand.
author: orklando
